(:action boil ; Boil an entity and update its state
  :parameters (?entity1 - entity ?entity2 - entity)
  :precondition (and (at ?entity1 raw) (at ?entity2 cold))
  :effect (and (at ?entity1 boiling) (at ?entity2 hot) (not (at ?entity2 cold))

(:action add ; Add an item to a location and update the status
:parameters (?item - object ?location - container)
:precondition (and (at ?item source) (at ?location ready))
:effect (and (at ?item in_location) (not (at ?item source))

(:action stirfry
    :parameters (?npc - person ?k - kitchen)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?npc ?k) 
        (cooking ?npc ?k) 
        (has_ingredient ?npc oil) 
        (has_ingredient ?npc sauce) 
        (has_ingredient ?npc macaroni)
        (boiled ?npc macaroni))
    :effect (and 
        (cooked ?npc stirfry) 
        (not (cooking ?npc ?k))
